channel.title: Hackerrank on Software Engineering Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hackerrank on Software Engineering Blog

item.title: Case Study - Crosswords Puzzle
item.description: As a software engineer, I always enjoy solving problems and that’s why I sometimes go to the coding challenge websites like hackerrank and pick one problem to solve. This time I searched in functional programming category and crosswords-101 caught my eye and I decided to solve it in Scala in a very clean and understandable way and not in a contest style way of programming! This article is going to reveal how I solved this puzzle.
